sectionData.title: Team Identity and Purpose
sectionData.description: It is essential for any team to have a firmly established identity and purpose. High performing teams have a clear identity and this is often highly visible within the team's workspace itself. To function well teams need to understand their purpose and make their purpose known to other teams. High performing teams often have a mission statement and work to a shared vision making it clear to other teams exactly what the team does.

questions.amber: Team workspace may not clearly reflect team identity
Purpose emerging but not made known

questions.red: No shared vision or mission statement
questions.amber: Partial shared vision or mission statement
questions.green: Shared vision / mission statement established and communicated

sectionData.title: Team Culture
sectionData.description: High performing teams demonstrate the following attributes: continuous learning and improvement, strong focus on automation, quality and DevOps as well as respect for people and helpfulness.
